Name: French Mojito
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
15 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Lightly MUDDLE mint in base of glass (just to bruise). Add other ingredients. Half-fill glass with crushed ice and CHURN (stir) with bar spoon. Continue to add crushed ice and churn until drink is level with glass rim.
Review: A classic Mojito with a hint of berry fruit flavour and colour
History: For more recipes, its origins and history, see the Mojito Cocktail .
